LanguageData.Kurin_Shell_Cardigan.description: Fluffy and warm cardigan. Be careful not to stretch your clothes!
LanguageData.Kurin_Shell_Duster.description: It is a stylish coat that can prevent significant heat and some cold.
LanguageData.Kurin_Shell_Winter_Padding.description: Thick winter padding. It is a winter necessity for Kurin who burns well.
LanguageData.Kurin_OnSkin_Traditional_Coat.descriptio: Kurin's traditional costume features a white pattern on a simple navy blue coat.
